text.section:
This section does not apply to an individual who is:
Transferred from a facility of another state to a State facility under the Interstate Compact on Mental Health; or
Admitted after an emergency evaluation under Part IV of this subtitle.

In addition to the other requirements of this subtitle, a State facility or a Veterans' Administration hospital may admit an individual who is 65 years old or older only if a geriatric evaluation team determines that there is no available, less restrictive form of care or treatment that is adequate for the needs of the individual.

section.section: Each geriatric evaluation shall be done by the geriatric evaluation team of a county health department.
Each geriatric evaluation team consists of the individuals whom the Secretary designates from multiple disciplines.
